scripts.test: npm run pre-test && env TEST=1 NO_LOG=1 mocha --timeout 600000 --reporter spec $(find tests -name '*.tests.js')
scripts.test-ci: npm run pre-test && env TEST=1 NO_LOG=1 istanbul cover _mocha -- --timeout 600000 --reporter mocha-junit-reporter $(find tests -name '*.tests.js')
scripts.coverage: npm run pre-test && env TEST=1 NO_LOG=1 istanbul cover _mocha -- --timeout 600000 $(find tests -name '*.tests.js')
scripts.doc: documentation build ./src/** -f md -o ./doc/DOCUMENTATION.md && documentation build ./src/modules/pluginsmanager/publicapis/** -f md -o ./doc/PUBLIC-APIS.md
scripts.pre-build: npm run doc && rm -Rf ./build/* && mkdir -p ./build/plugins && mkdir -p ./build/doc && mkdir -p ./build/data && cp ./data/config.json.default ./build/data/config.json && cp -R ./data/ssl ./build/data/ && cp ./doc/PLUGIN.md ./build/doc/ && cp ./doc/PUBLIC-APIS.md ./build/doc/ && cp -R ./scripts ./build/ && cp -R ./res ./build/
scripts.build: npm run pre-build && pkg -o ./build/hautomation . && find ./node_modules -name '*.node' -exec cp -Rf {} ./build/ \;
scripts.build-arm: npm run pre-build && pkg -o ./build/hautomation . && find ./node_modules -name '*.node' -exec cp -Rf {} ./build/ \; && find ./node_modules -name '*.node' | grep arm | xargs cp -Rf -t ./build/
scripts.build-deb: rm -Rf ./build/deb && rm -Rf /tmp/deb && cp -R ./scripts/deb /tmp/deb && sed -e s@{VERSION}@$npm_package_version@ ./scripts/deb/DEBIAN/control > /tmp/deb/DEBIAN/control && cp -R ./build/* /tmp/deb/var/hautomation/ && chmod 755 /tmp/deb/DEBIAN/pre* && chmod 755 /tmp/deb/DEBIAN/post* && dpkg-deb --build /tmp/deb ./build/hautomation.deb && rm -Rf /tmp/deb
